changes: Switched from clipboard-only blobs to Firebase-backed storage (token size ➜ 35-40 chars)
End-to-end AES-GCM encryption – backend never sees plaintext
Added LZ-String compression (payloads 3-8× smaller; fits Firestore 1 MiB limit)
Replaced blocking alert()s with Toastify JS toasts (non-intrusive UX)
One-click restore re-implemented inside page context (cookie injection exactly like v1.0)
First pass at premium UI – modern glassmorphism panel, neon accent buttons
